name: add_user_time_format
description: Add time_format column to users table with European-friendly default
author: Development Team
notes: Adds time_format column with default 'H:mm' (24-hour format, popular in Europe)
Supports formats: 'h:mm a' (11:26 pm), 'h:mm A' (11:26 PM), 'H:mm' (23:26), 'H:mm:ss' (23:26:59)
